WorkItem.Description: an end to end n-tier sample app demonstrating using entity framework 4 (using POCO Entities or Self-tracking entities), with or without Repository pattern, UnitofWork pattern, dependency injection, or specification pattern but using WCF 4 and can be used for different user interface archetypes (e.g. asp.net web forms, asp.net mvc, xaml applications(Silverlight or WPF) with clear and succinct documentation or comment in English.
WorkItem.Summary: N-tier Entity Framework 4 end to end sample app
